name: Portfolio Development
description: This class is a drawing class for anyone who wants to improve their drawing skills. Need a portfolio but not sure where to start? This special workshop will help you get a jump start on your drawing portfolio, polish you skills and boost your confidence. Focus on still life, figure drawing, portraits, proportions, hands and faces. - All materials provided - 8 week program

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
